page.title: 17Coolham/Shipley Local Issues
page.content: Shipley has lost its bus service and local shop/P.O. Coolham's bus service is very reduced despite the recent new brick/tile bus shelter. Planning policy limits new building & there is concern that the village schools increasingly depend on "out of area" children to maintain numbers. Preserving the character of the area is a "live" issue among locals as is the traffic problem in Coolham. The newly formed Coolham Recreation Ground Association is asking the Parish Council to improve & maintain this once fully equipped amenity. In Shipley there is concern about the future of the Knepp Estate. Residents in the area are now happily looking forward to the 900th anniversary celebrations of Christian Worship in Shipley Church on 22 September 1985.
